content: this adorable and easy-to-follow heart granny square blanket crochet pattern combines the timeless appeal of granny squares with the sweetness of hearts and creates a charming and snuggly creation that s perfect for keeping your little bundle of joy warm and cozy you can easily customize the size and colors whether you re creating it for your own little one or as a heartfelt gift for a new arrival this blanket is sure to become a beloved keepsake for years to come
